about_the_game:
Games we grew up with often hold a special place in our hearts, and hearing the familiar melodies takes us back to a happy place.

Created by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, Classic Fantasy Music pack contains a variety of songs that will find a home in any fantasy-based game. Inspired heavily by favorite RPGs such as Final Fantasy, Chrono Trigger, and Zelda to name a few, this pack is a familiar trip down memory lane.

This pack contains:

  • 16 BGM tracks suitable for dungeons, character themes, town themes and more.
  • Inspired by classic RPG games.
  • .ogg, .mp3 and .m4a formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker MZ, Unity Music, Unreal Music, or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

1 - Castle in the Sky
2 - The Pregame
3 - Spanish Theme
4 - Sunday Meadows
5 - Adventure Time!
6 - Tears of Sorrow
7 - The Adventurer
8 - The Chase
9 - The Final Battle
10 - Village in the Valley
11 - Township Celebration
12 - The Heart Years For Home
13 - Pregame 2
14 - The Realm of Battle (Conquest)
15 - The Realm of Battle (Regret)
16 - War Games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Classic Fantasy Music Pack and "RPG Maker MV - Classic Fantasy Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
